articles.author: Laura Dobberstein
articles.title: NASA humanoid robot to be tested as remote oil rig attendant - The Register
articles.description: Doing the dirty work for Australia's Woodside Energy will help prepare bot for work in space
articles.content: NASA announced on Friday its humanoid robot, Valkyrie, is headed to Western Australia, where Perth-based Woodside Energy will put it through its paces with a view to "remote caretaking of uncrewed an… [+2423 chars]
